name: Despair (V)
Lore: 'The carbonite froze more than just Han''s body.',
Text: 'Deploy on table. During your battle phase, while you have a frozen captive, opponent''s cards may not move. At same site as Jabba''s Prize, opponent''s cards are deploy +1 and your Force drains are +2. My Favorite Decoration may not be placed out of play. (Immune to Alter.)(Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)',
